All Classes

Class Description
Action
An atomic alteration of an entity.
ActionStratDeferredConverterFactory
DeferredConverterFactory.ActionStrat provided by the pancake platform.
Animated
Loops through a set of frames.
Application
Provides for interactions with the service running the GameLoop.
Application.Config
Configuration for running applications.
Audio
A configurable and playable piece of audio.
Audio.State
A discrete state an audio instance may be in.
AudioFactory
Generates Audio instances.
AudioStratDeferredConverterFactory
DeferredConverterFactory.AudioStrat provided by the pancake platform.
AveragedValue
A value represented as the average of its previous several samples.
BoundedValue<T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>>
A value between minimum and maximum bounds.
Box
A 2 or 3 dimensional box.
Camera
A viewport on a render medium providing for mapping between absolute and relative/rendered positions.
CollectiveAction
An Action which applies a collection of delegate actions.
Collider
Provides methods for calculating intersection occurrence and for resolving collisions.
Component
A container of entity data.
CompositeRenderable<T extends Renderable>
A collection of renderable artifacts rendered as a unit.
Config
Provides access to configuration.
CreateEntity
Event requesting an entity be created.
DebugRenderer
Renders debug information.
Deferred<K,​V>
A deferred resolution to some value.
DeferredConverterFactory<T>
Generates converters converting primitive objects to deferreds.
DeferredConverterFactory.ActionStrat
Generates Action deferred converters.
DeferredConverterFactory.AudioStrat
Generates Audio deferred converters.
DeferredConverterFactory.RenderableStrat
Generates Renderable deferred converters.
DeferredConverterFactory.VectorStrat
Generates Vector3 deferred converters.
DestroyEntity
Event requesting an entity be destroyed.
Entity
A container of Components of distinct implementation types.
EntityCreated
Event broadcast when an entity is created.
EntityDestroyed
Event broadcast when an entity is destroyed.
EntityPool
A set of uniquely-identified "component-bag" entities.
Event
Some occurrence broadcast to all registered listeners at the beginning of a tick.
EventLoop
Supports registration of event handlers and enqueuing of event instances.
EventLoop.Broadcasting
An EventLoop implementation supporting broadcasting events.
GameEngine
Central game management module.
GameLoop
Main game loop.
GameSystem
Performs work on entities matching a certain component signature.
Image
A renderable static image.
Limiter
A timer which is ready after a set number of ns have elapsed since its previous ready state.
MultiStageAction
An Action which applies a different action depending on its current state.
MultiStageAction.ArmingOption
Arms a MultiStageAction to change state in a particular way next time it is applied.
PerformanceCounter
Maintains performance counts.
PerformanceCounter.Usage
Tracks the average time usage of a game system.
Registry<K,​V>
A collection of loaded resources retrievable by some key.
Renderable
Something drawable on a RenderMedium.
RenderableStratDeferredConverterFactory
DeferredConverterFactory.RenderableStrat provided by the pancake platform.
RenderMedium
Provides for rendering various graphical artifacts.
RenderTransform
Transform settings for rendering a Renderable.
ResourceReader<T>
Reads deferred resources from streams.
Resources
Provides safe access to resources.
Services
Provides access to instances of singleton services discovered at runtime.
Shape
A freeform renderable artifact.
Shape.Color
Defines the sRGB color of rendered shapes.
Signature
A distinct combination of registered component types.
Text
A string of text.
Vector1
A point in 1-dimensional space.
Vector2
A head at some point in 2 dimensions and tail at (0, 0).
Vector3
A head at some point in 3 dimensions and tail at (0, 0, 0).
VectorMath
Performs computations involving vectors.
Vectors
Provides vector implementations.
VectorStratDeferredConverterFactory
DeferredConverterFactory.VectorStrat provided by the pancake platform.
Viewport
A constrained view on a renderable artifact.
